name: glasscode
description: Apply beautiful glassmorphism transparency effects to VS Code sections â€” editor, terminal, sidebar, and more. Fully customizable opacity, blur intensity, and per-section control.

glassCode.glassmorphism.description: Enable glassmorphism blur effect (backdrop-filter). When disabled, only transparency is applied without frosted glass blur.

glassCode.backgroundImage.description: Optional background wallpaper image (URL or absolute file path). Leave empty for no wallpaper. The glassmorphism effect looks best with a background image.

glassCode.backgroundOpacity.description: Opacity of the background wallpaper image (0.0 = invisible, 1.0 = fully visible).

glassCode.editor.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the editor area (code editing space).

glassCode.editor.opacity.description: Editor background opacity (0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque).

glassCode.editor.blur.description: Editor glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.

glassCode.panel.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the bottom panel (terminal, debug console, output, ports).

glassCode.panel.opacity.description: Panel background opacity (0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque).

glassCode.panel.blur.description: Panel glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.

glassCode.sidebar.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the sidebar (explorer, search, extensions, etc.).

glassCode.sidebar.opacity.description: Sidebar background opacity (0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque).

glassCode.sidebar.blur.description: Sidebar glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.

glassCode.activityBar.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the activity bar (leftmost icon bar).

glassCode.activityBar.blur.description: Activity bar glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.

glassCode.statusBar.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the status bar (bottom bar).

glassCode.statusBar.blur.description: Status bar glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.

glassCode.titleBar.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the title bar.

glassCode.titleBar.blur.description: Title bar glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.

glassCode.tabBar.enabled.description: Apply glass effect to the editor tab bar.

glassCode.tabBar.blur.description: Tab bar glassmorphism blur radius in pixels.
